definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[שׁוּק]] (√ of foll., meaning dub.; Ar. sa0qa is drive beast etc., carry on affairs; Eth. soqa: sustain; cf. Ar. sa0qun leg, esp. shank, Aram. [[שׁוֹקָא]] leg (rare), 4oqo0 leg, thigh; connexion dub. with As. suḳu, street, Aram. [[שׁוּקָא]], 4uwqo0, street, market-place (whence Ar. suwqun loan-word acc. to Frä:187; but then s = [[שׁ]]?), Palm. [[שוק]] id., Lzb:373).
